txt.en: Stop the pillagers from escaping with Pelargir's ancient treasures.
<rgb=#00FF00>That was the last of the pillagers. At least some of Pelargir's treasures have been saved.</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>Do not allow all the pillagers to get away. ([placeholder]/[placeholder])</rgb>
Corsairs are making off with Pelargir's historic treasures. Stop them before they get away!

Pillagers are sneaking off with many of Pelargir's ancient treasures. Stop as many as you can before the treasures are lost for good.

The pillagers are carrying the goods from a building to the east of your position and escaping through a broken fence to the west.

This quest starts with <rgb=#FFFF00>empty</rgb> Merit Rating.

<rgb=#00FF00>Merit Gain:</rgb>
* Defeat pillagers
Stop pillagers from escaping with treasures ([placeholder]/10)
<rgb=#FF0000>Do not allow all the pillagers to get away ([placeholder]/10)</rgb>
Stop as many pillagers from stealing treasures as you can
